test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function As per example 1 of the F&O specs

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function As per example 2 of the F&O specs.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function involving a "numeric-less-than" operation (lt operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-4
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function involving a "numeric-less-than" operation (le operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-5
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function using the empty sequence as an argument. Use count function to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-6
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function that returns a dayTimeDuration of 0.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-7
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function that uses a timezone of -0.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-8
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as part of a "+" expression.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-9
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as part of a "-" expression.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-10
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as as an argument to the "not" function. Uses the "fn:string" function to account for new EBV rules.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-11
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as part of a "div" expression.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-12
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as an argument to the fn:number function. returns "NaN".

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-13
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as an argument to the "fn:boolean" function. Uses the "fn:string" function to account for new EBV rules.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-14
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as argument to the "fn:string" function.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-15
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as part of an "and" expression. Uses the "fn:string" function to account for new EBV rules.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-16
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (eq operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-17
test-case.description: Evaluates The "month-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (ne operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-18
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (le operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-19
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (ge operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-date-20
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-date" function as part of an "or" expression. Uses the "fn:string" function to account for new EBV rules.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-date()`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-date((), "Wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(timezone-from-date(()))`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-date(()) instance of xs:dayTimeDuration?`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-date(xs:date("2004-10-12Z")) eq xs:dayTimeDuration("PT0S")`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-date(xs:date("2004-10-12-08:23")) eq xs:dayTimeDuration("-PT8H23M")`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(timezone-from-date(xs:date("2004-10-12")))`.
